dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
X. Wang
S. Takaki
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: The publicly available VBD dataset is commonly employed as a benchmark in single-channel SE tasks. This dataset does not have a validation set, so the authors split the training data into two sets: training set and validation set, specifically reserving the speakers 'p226' and 'p287' for validation.
dcterms:title: VoiceBank-DEMAND (VBD)

dcterms:creator: J. Barker
R. Marxer
E. Vincent
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: The WSJ0-C3 single-channel dataset mixes clean speech utterances from the Wall Street Journal dataset with noise signals from the CHiME3 dataset, with a uniformly sampled signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) between 0 and 20 dB. The dataset is split into a train (12777 files), validation (1206 files), and test set (651 files).
dcterms:title: WSJ0-CHiME3 (WSJ0-C3)

dcterms:creator: J. S. Garofolo
D. Graff
D. Paul
D. Pallett
dcterms:description: The Wall Street Journal (WSJ0) dataset is a complete dataset used for various speech recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal (WSJ0)
